text: The women's field hockey tournament at the 2012 Summer Olympics was the 9th version of the field hockey tournament at the Summer Olympics. It began on 29 July, and ended on 10 August. The Netherlands won the tournament over Argentina. == Teams == Teams Qualified from the Host 2010 Asian Games Netherlands 2011 Women's EuroHockey Nations Championship 2011 Women's EuroHockey Nations Championship 2011 Oceania Cup 2011 Pan American Games Olympic Qualification Tournament 1,2 and 3 InvitedSouth Africa originally won the 2011 African Olympic Qualifier, but they then withdrew and won the Olympic Qualification Tournament 1 instead. Because they needed 12 teams in the tournament, they invited the best team that didn't qualify, Argentina. == First round == === Pool A === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Netherlands 5 5 0 0 12 5 +7 15 5 3 0 2 14 7 +7 9 5 2 1 2 6 3 +3 7 5 2 0 3 9 13 –4 6 5 1 1 3 4 9 –5 4 5 0 2 3 2 10 –8 2 === Pool B === Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 5 3 1 1 12 4 +8 10 5 3 1 1 9 5 +4 10 5 3 1 1 5 2 +3 10 5 2 1 2 6 7 –1 7 5 1 0 4 9 14 –5 3 5 1 0 4 4 13 –9 3 == Medal round == == Statistics == === Team rankings === Rank Team 1 Netherlands 7 6 1 0 16 7 +9 19 2 7 4 1 2 14 7 +7 13 3 7 4 0 3 18 10 +8 12 4 7 3 2 2 12 10 +2 11 Eliminated in the First round 5 5 3 1 1 5 2 +3 10 6 5 2 1 2 6 3 +3 7 7 5 2 1 2 6 7 –1 7 8 5 2 0 3 9 13 –4 6 9 5 1 1 3 4 9 –5 4 10 5 1 0 4 9 14 –5 3 11 5 1 0 4 4 13 –9 3 12 5 0 2 3 2 10 –8 2 == Other websites == * Results on olympic.org == References == Category:2012 Summer Olympics Category:Field hockey
title: Field hockey at the 2012 Summer Olympics – Women's tournament
